title: The 8 Best Cloud Couch Alternatives to Elevate Your Lazy Sundays
description: Get all the comfort without the cost.
excerpt: We found the best cloud couch dupes that offer the same appeal at a better price. These couches come vetted by me, as well as experts at Good Housekeeping﻿.
text: The Two-Seater OptionVanAcc Comfy Loveseat with Extra Deep Seats ProsUnder $500 Easy assembly ConsSome customers say the cushions are too softIf you’re working with a small living space—or a small budget—this Amazon option might be the one for you. The only con…it sits really low, which makes it makes a little harder to get up from it.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowHow to Pick the Right Cloud Couch Dupe for You HEARSTHere are some important aspects to factor in on your search: Budget. This is pretty self-explanatory. While a quality couch can be a great item to invest in, it isn’t a necessity. So, if your budget is already tight, consider the more affordable options first. Luckily, there are a ton of great dupes at reasonable prices. On the flip side, if you do want to splash out with an expensive purchase, a couch that you will get a lot of use out of is likely to be something you won’t regret.Size. How big of a space are you working with? If you’re crammed into a studio apartment, a loveseat would be your best bet. But if you’re looking to fill a cavernous den, the bigger, the better. Remember, measurements are your friend. You don’t want to go through the hassle of having furniture delivered and assembled just to find it isn’t quite right.Customization. Are you looking for a couch that can grow with you? For instance, if you’re confined to a small space currently but want to keep the same furniture when you eventually upgrade, a modular couch system is for you. With this style, you can buy individual pieces at a time and add to your setup along the way. Customization can also refer to the fabric. For those who want a specific textile or unique color, there are dupes that offer a wide variety of options.Material. Do you have pets? Kids? A book club with a tendency to spill wine? If an easy-to-clean couch is not important to your lifestyle, don’t worry about this. But if it is, you know this is crucial. Look for options that are washable or even leather. html:
The Two-Seater Option

VanAcc Comfy Loveseat with Extra Deep Seats

Pros

  • Under $500
  • Easy assembly

Cons

  • Some customers say the cushions are too soft

If you’re working with a small living space—or a small budget—this Amazon option might be the one for you.

Colors: Gray, Off-White, Beige

Dimensions: Length: 63 inches; depth: 35 inches

Customer review: “The quality is really great for a budget couch! Very supportive, the seated cushions are a little on the firmer side, but still comfy. The fabric is also very soft and just so pretty! I got the matching ottoman to go with it, too. All in all, I’m very happy with this purchase, and I think it’s absolutely worth the money.”

The Recliner Dupe

Homebody Coconut 3 Seat Sectional with 1 Recliner

Pros

  • Available in many configurations (modular)
  • Reclines
  • 100-day trial
  • Easy to assemble
  • Rave reviews

Hello to my new favorite place to lounge. Homebody is a sustainable furniture startup making the ultra-buildable reclining sectional.

Colors: 7 options

Dimensions: Length: 128.4 inches; depth: 39 inches

Customer review: “We LOVE the new couch!...The pet-friendly material is easy to clean and not fun at all for the cat to scratch so that is a triple win in our house!...We couldn’t be happier!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Amazon Pick

Meridian Furniture Contemporary Collection Down-Filled 2-Seater

Pros

  • Spacious
  • Stylish
  • Modular
  • Available in several configurations and sizes

Cons

    It can hardly be called affordable, but this Meridian Furniture sectional is SO similar to RH’s cloud couch, and Good Housekeeping gave this option high remarks, too.

    Colors: Black, Cream, Grey, or Navy

    Dimensions: Length: 70 inches; depth: 35 inches (for the armless two-seater)

    The Modular

    West Elm Harmony Modular 3-Piece Ottoman Sectional

    Pros

    • Modular
    • Handcrafted
    • White glove service available
    • Durable

    Before West Elm Caleb broke the internet, the brand was most well-known for its insanely good quality. The Good Housekeeping team dubbed this as the best overall cloud couch dupe.

    Colors: Over 100 options

    Dimensions: Length: 122 inches; depth: 86 inches

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    The Wayfair Find

    Wayfair Custom Upholstery Emilio Sofa

    Pros

    • Under $1,200
    • Reversible cushions
    • Washable cover

    Cons

    • Assembly required
    • Some customers have complaints about the fabric quality

    Did you know you should flip your cushions? It’s akin to rotating or flipping your mattress. My mother used to despise that our couch cushions were one-sided. The underside had seams and random stitching that made them un-flippable. You won’t have that problem with this couch from Wayfair.

    Colors: 47 options

    Dimensions: Length: 90 inches; depth: 41inches

    Customer review: “Great quality for the price. Deep cushions. Comes with really nice quality big pillows. This photo does not do it justice...Overall, great purchase.”

    The Chaise Design

    Hamilton Round Chaise Sectional Sofa

    Pros

    • Uniquely stylish round chaise
    • Removable covers

    Cons

    • One size
    • Limited colors

    Hamilton’s sofa has something no other cloud couch has: a round chaise that looks oh-so chic and is perfect for curling up.

    Colors: Brilliant White or Smoke Grey

    Dimensions: Length: 122 inches; depth: 57.1 inches

    Customer review: “Elegant, modern, and exceptionally comfortable spacious sofa. The grey smoke fabric effortlessly complements our home and will suit any other interior design. This sofa now makes our house complete; it is a must-have!”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    The Sectional

    Mario Capasa Feathers Sectional

    Pros

    • Handmade
    • Washable covers
    • Highly reviewed

    Cons

    • Sits low, according to some customers
    • Expensive when not on sale (but discounts are major!)

    This couch may be smaller, but it looks like a dead ringer for the O.G. cloud couch—and customers say it feels like sitting on a cloud, too. According to Good Housekeeping, this is the best value dupe.

    Colors: Beige or Grey

    Dimensions: Length: 110 inches; depth: 67 inches

    Customer review: “Love my couch! Feels like I’m lying on a cloud! Super dog friendly, I have a handheld vacuum, and it takes seconds to clean up any hair from my black lab! I once spilled wine and was able to clean it white with just a damp cloth! Worth every penny!”

    The Original

    RH Cloud Sofa

    Pros

    • Available in five lengths and two depths
    • Cult following
    • Very customizable

    Cons

    • Expensive
    • Some customers say it’s not worth the price tag

    As a frame of reference, here is the original cloud couch from RH. The sofa that launched a thousand dupes.

    Colors: 128 fabric options with additional leather options

    Dimensions: Length: 84 inches; depth: 40 inches (for the 7’ Classic Sofa)

    Customer review: “We absolutely love this sofa–for it’s aesthetics and comfort...The quality is impeccable, from the comfort to how well it is made....Ours is 100% down-filled, and never once have I seen a feather come loose. The only con…it sits really low, which makes it makes a little harder to get up from it.”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    How to Pick the Right Cloud Couch Dupe for You

    Here are some important aspects to factor in on your search:

    • Budget. This is pretty self-explanatory. While a quality couch can be a great item to invest in, it isn’t a necessity. So, if your budget is already tight, consider the more affordable options first. Luckily, there are a ton of great dupes at reasonable prices. On the flip side, if you do want to splash out with an expensive purchase, a couch that you will get a lot of use out of is likely to be something you won’t regret.
    • Size. How big of a space are you working with? If you’re crammed into a studio apartment, a loveseat would be your best bet. But if you’re looking to fill a cavernous den, the bigger, the better. Remember, measurements are your friend. You don’t want to go through the hassle of having furniture delivered and assembled just to find it isn’t quite right.
    • Customization. Are you looking for a couch that can grow with you? For instance, if you’re confined to a small space currently but want to keep the same furniture when you eventually upgrade, a modular couch system is for you. With this style, you can buy individual pieces at a time and add to your setup along the way. Customization can also refer to the fabric. For those who want a specific textile or unique color, there are dupes that offer a wide variety of options.
    • Material. Do you have pets? Kids? A book club with a tendency to spill wine? If an easy-to-clean couch is not important to your lifestyle, don’t worry about this. But if it is, you know this is crucial. Look for options that are washable or even leather.

    Why Trust ELLE

    Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
